description: This is a Python source file for a Streamlit web application that implements an interactive answer engine called 'Sage'. It sets up the UI, manages session state, loads a language model agent, and handles user interactions and responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the language model agent used for generating responses.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that sets up and runs the Streamlit app, managing UI components, session state, and interaction flow.
